title: Ukukhusela Iplanethi Yethu
subtitle: Ukulondolozwa Kwendalo
description: Ukuphumeza iindlela ezizinzileyo kunye nemizamo yolondolozo ukugcina i-ecosystems kwizizukulwana ezizayo ngelixa sinika imiphakathi yasekuhlaleni amandla.

title: Ezempilo Kubo Bonke
subtitle: Impilo Yoluntu
description: Ukubonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo eziyimfuneko kunye nemfundo yezempilo kwimiphakathi engakhathalelwanga, ukuqinisekisa ukuba wonke umntu unokufikelela kukhathalelo lwezonyango olusemgangathweni.
title: Impembelelo Yethu Ekhulayo

stories.title: Amabali Ethu Empembelelo
stories.subtitle: Fumanisa indlela esidala ngayo utshintsho oluzinzileyo kwimiphakathi yehlabathi lonke

cta.title: Ukulungele Ukutshala Imbewu Yotshintsho?
cta.subtitle: Joyina uluntu lwethu olukhulayo lwabaguquli kwaye usincede sikhulise ithemba kwimiphakathi efuna kakhulu. Yonke iminikelo, nokuba ingakanani na, idala amaza otshintsho oluhle.

hero.subtitle: Njengomthi we-baobab onamandla, sikholelwa kwiingcambu ezinzulu, ukukhula okuqinileyo, kunye nempembelelo ehlala ihleli.

mission.title: Umsebenzi Wethu
mission.text: Ukukhulisa ukukhula okuzinzileyo kwimiphakathi ngemfundo, ukunika amandla, kunye nokhathalelo lwendalo, ukudala utshintsho oluhle oluhlala luhleli oluthatha izizukulwana.
mission.description: Kusukela ekusekweni kwethu ngo-2020, sizibophelele ekudaleni izisombululo ezizinzileyo ezijongana neengcambu zobuhlwempu, ukungalingani, kunye nokonakaliswa kwendalo.

values.title: Iinqobo Zethu Ezisisiseko
values.subtitle: Iinqobo zethu ezisisiseko zikhokela zonke izigqibo esizenzayo kunye nazo zonke izenzo esizenzayo kwinkonzo yomsebenzi wethu.
values.growthDescription: Sikholelwa ekukhuliseni izisombululo zexesha elide, ezizinzileyo ezikhula zibe namandla ngokuhamba kwexesha, njengomthi we-baobab.
values.communityDescription: Imiphakathi isentliziyweni yakho konke esikwenzayo. Siyamamela, sifunda, kwaye sisebenza kunye ukuze sidale utshintsho olunentsingiselo.
values.transparencyDescription: Sigcina ukungafihli okupheleleyo kwimisebenzi yethu, kwimali yethu, kunye nempembelelo yethu ukuze sakhe ukuthembana oluhlala luhleli nabaxhasi bethu.
values.empowermentDescription: Sinika abantu kunye nemiphakathi amandla ngezixhobo, ulwazi, kunye nezixhobo abazidingayo ukuze baphumelele ngokuzimeleyo.

timeline.title: Sikhula Kunye Kusukela Ngo-2020
timeline.subtitle: Kusukela ekuqaleni okunokuthobeka ukuya kwimpembelelo yehlabathi, bona indlela i-BAOBAB HOPE ekhule ngayo kwaye yavela.

milestone2.description: Yasungula amanyathelo okufunda nokubhala kwimiphakathi emi-3

milestone3.description: Yandiswa ukubandakanya iiprojekthi zolondolozo kunye nokuzinza

milestone4.description: Yazisa iikliniki zempilo ezihambayo kunye nemfundo yezempilo

milestone5.description: Ngoku isebenza kumazwe ali-18 kwilizwekazi eli-4

impact.title: Impembelelo Yethu Ekhulayo
impact.subtitle: Amanani axela ibali lobomi obuguqulweyo kunye nemiphakathi enikwe amandla.

team.title: Abantu Abasemva Komsebenzi
team.subtitle: Dibana nabantu abazinikeleyo abakhokela umbutho wethu kwaye baqhuba umsebenzi wethu phambili.

member2.name: UJean-Baptiste Dubois
member2.bio: Ingcali yemfundo egxile kwiinkqubo zokufunda eziqhutywa luluntu

member3.name: USarah Chen
member3.bio: Umphathi wezempilo onomdla kukhathalelo lwezonyango olufikelelekayo

history.title: Imbali Yethu
history.subtitle: Uhambo lwe-BAOBAB HOPE ukusuka kumbono omncinci ukuya kwintshukumo yehlabathi

founding.title: Ukuqala Kwethemba
founding.description: I-BAOBAB HOPE yasekwa ngo-2020 ngombono olula kodwa onamandla: ukudala utshintsho oluzinzileyo kwimiphakathi yehlabathi lonke.

growth.title: Ukukhula Kweengcambu
growth.description: Kusukela ekuqaleni kwethu okunokuthobeka, sikhule ukuze sikhonze imiphakathi kumazwe ali-18, sihlala sithembekile kwiinqobo zethu ezisisiseko.

impact.title: Ukwenza Impembelelo
impact.description: Namhlanje, siguqule ubomi obungaphezu kwe-75,000 ngeenkqubo zethu zemfundo, ezempilo, kunye nezendalo.

cta.title: Yiba Yinxalenye Yebali Lethu
cta.subtitle: Joyina amawaka amavolontiya kunye nabaxhasi abasinceda sibhale isahluko esilandelayo sethemba.

projects.title: Izenzo Zethu
projects.subtitle: Fumanisa amanyathelo aguqukayo adala utshintsho oluhlala luhleli kwimiphakathi yehlabathi lonke.

education.title: Imfundo Nokufunda
education.description: Ukwakha iziseko zemfundo ezinika imiphakathi amandla ukuze ziphumelele kwaye zikhule ngendlela ezinzileyo.

environment.title: Ukulondolozwa Kwendalo
environment.description: Ukukhusela nokubuyisela i-ecosystems ngelixa kufundiswa imiphakathi yasekuhlaleni iindlela ezizinzileyo.

healthcare.title: Ezempilo Zoluntu
healthcare.description: Ukubonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo eziyimfuneko kunye nemfundo yezempilo kwimiphakathi engakhathalelwanga.

water.title: Ukufikelela Kumanzi Acocekileyo
water.description: Ukwakha iinkqubo zamanzi ezizinzileyo nokufundisa ukulondolozwa kwamanzi.

blog.title: Iindaba Zamva Nje
blog.subtitle: Hlala unolwazi ngamabali ethu empembelelo yamva nje kunye neendaba zoluntu
blog.title: Hlala Unolwazi
blog.subtitle: Bhalisela incwadana yethu yeendaba ukuze ufumane uhlaziyo lwamva nje

information.title: Indawo Yolwazi
information.subtitle: Fikelela izixhobo, iindaba, kunye nemibono malunga nomsebenzi wethu nempembelelo yethu

newsletter.title: Hlala Unolwazi
newsletter.subtitle: Fumana uhlaziyo lwamva nje kunye nemibono

hero.subtitle: Sikhona ukunceda nokuphendula nayiphi na imibuzo onokuba nayo

volunteer.title: Yiba Livolontiya
volunteer.description: Joyina uluntu lwethu lwamavolontiya enza umahluko

partner.title: Amathuba Obambiswano
partner.description: Hlola iindlela zokubambisana nathi ukuze ufumane impembelelo enkulu

donate.title: Nikela
donate.subtitle: Inkxaso yakho isinceda sidale utshintsho oluhlala luhleli kwimiphakathi yehlabathi lonke

hero.subtitle: Wonke umnikelo, nokuba mncinci kangakanani, wenza umahluko wokwenene

donate.monthly: Yenza oku kube ngumnikelo wenyanga zonke

why.title: Kutheni Unikela Kwi-BAOBAB HOPE?
why.item1: Ukungafihli okungu-100% kwindlela imali esetyenziswa ngayo
why.item2: Impembelelo ethe ngqo kwimiphakathi yehlabathi lonke
why.item3: Izisombululo ezizinzileyo ezidala utshintsho oluhlala luhleli
